Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: TFL is an active , well - tolerated regimen in metastatic breast cancer .

| Disease |
| --- |
| metastatic breast cancer |

Explanation:

* "metastatic breast cancer" is a disease entity as it refers to a specific medical condition where breast cancer has spread to other parts of the body.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| metastatic breast cancer |

Explanation:

* "TFL" and "regimen" are not diseases, but rather a treatment regimen.
* "breast cancer" is not a disease in itself, but a type of cancer. I have included the more specific "metastatic breast cancer" as it refers to a more advanced stage of the disease.
